description: Facebook Ads analysis, in this course we will learn about analyzing Facebook Ads to optimize campaigns and achieve better results. You'll explore key metrics like CTR, CPC, and ROAS, understand audience insights, and evaluate ad performance. Discover how to troubleshoot campaigns, use A/B testing, and improve ROI. Learn to interpret data, refine targeting, and create data-driven strategies for effective ads. By the end, you'll have the skills to assess and enhance any Facebook Ads campaign, ensuring higher engagement and profitability. This course is perfect for marketers, business owners, and anyone aiming to maximize their ad performance on Facebook. Coupler․io Academy
